t: Polis Books To Shutter - Publishers Lunch
s: May 21, 2024 - Independent publisher Polis Books will close soon and the press has been looking for new publishers for its books in progress. Polis‚Äôs website already appears to be defunct. Founded in 2013, the line has been distributed by PGW, and added the Agora Books imprint in 2019.
